install.name: User - NFPT External User Change
install.author: Levi Carter
install.description: Plugin for NFPT to update users_live table. To be used in conjunction with the nfptusersync plugin.

param.name: myupdatefield
param.label: My Site Suffix
param.description: field suffix for this website in the users_live table (eg: ns)

param.name: failemail
param.label: Failsafe Email Address
param.description: email address to notify if there is a problem updating the user in the main database
